pages.name: Sununicorn
pages.text: Accessed with the $(l:gotchard/items/unicon_ride_chemy_card)Unicon$(/l) or $(l:gotchard/items/the_sun_ride_chemy_card)The Sun$(/l) Ride Chemy Card (both cards must be in your inventory)

pages.title: Kamen Rider Majade
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gotchard/devices/alchemisdriver)Alchemisdriver (Majade)$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Jump Boost
